name: Bubble Protector
description:
My entry to the bubble themed Mini Jam 84. It's not very good at all, but this is my first game that I've ever completed. I've never worked with Unity before so I found myself spending most of my time figuring out how it worked. 

My only real goal with this submission was to finally finish a programming / game project. (after so many abandoned projects)

I incorporated the limitation by using the players health as both the construction material for towers, and the ammo for shooting. I added a 'resupply at home' feature to get around the player quickly running out of health.

I hope you enjoy this pretty crappy game, I had a blast making it.
